name: Winter Squash, Apple And Walnut Soup
keywords: appetizer, applesauce, butternut squash, heavy cream, winter
recipeIngredient: 2 12-ounce packages frozen pureed winter (butternut) squash, defrosted
Salt and white pepper to taste
1/2 cup toasted walnut pieces, for garnish

recipeInstructions.text: Combine all the ingredients except the walnuts pieces in a large saucepan and stir to blend well. Cook the soup over medium heat until warmed through, about six to eight minutes. Ladle the soup into bowls and add a few chopped walnut pieces in the center.
